data.title: Tim Murray on LinkedIn: #iheartradio #entertainment #podcast #youtube #broadway #theatre
data.meta_description: Broadway actress Amy Spanger stopped by for a slumber party! We chatted about her booking Tick Tick Boom, Reefer Madness, The Wedding Singer and her teenage…
data.text:
Doing a Live reading of my play at Dynasty Typewriter!! This cast is unbelievable and it’s going to be super funny. This show is for anyone who has ever stayed in a job they hated. Come get your catharsis from your scarcity mindset and laugh with us Feb 20th https://lnkd.in/g4pdnp6Q #job #mindset #restaurants #theatre

I’ve been rewriting my play as a screenplay for many years and I’m finally ready to turn it into a short film! It’s about a guy who is obsessed with getting people to like him until a colleague of his steals his idea and he must learn how to stand up for himself and stop trying to be everybody’s fave. To help make this project come to life donate here: https://lnkd.in/gEpKqHa8 thank you so much!! #film #people #project #lgbtq

Helene Yorke of The Other Two, which starts its second season on HBOMax tomorrow stopped by the podcast! We chat about working with a Molly Shannon, what it was like to be Glinda in Wicked and sleepovers during the Titanic times!! Make sure you watch the Other Two streaming tmrw. You might see a familiar face this season ❤️! #podcast #podcasts #television #tv #entertainment https://lnkd.in/gGT54-gT

My friend Michael Henry and I are returning to NYC to do our stand-up show July 12th at Union Hall! I was touring my hour of stand-up in the United States and U.K. before the shutdown. This will be our first time with a live audience in well over a year and I am so excited!!!! You may recognize Michael from YouTube where his queer comedy videos have reached over 40 million views. Come check us out! #show #comedy #pride #gay #LGBT #LGBTQ #LGBTQIA https://lnkd.in/gBPbiZ3

I had Broadway stars and real life best friends Dee Roscioli & Jackie Burns on my podcast to talk about what it was like to play the role of Elphaba, how it brought them together & what their sleepovers were like as kids! Elphabasties episode out now on iHeart Radio Broadway & YouTube! #podcast #entertainment #broadway #wicked #lgbtq #pridemonth

Claybourne Elder of Company on Broadway stopped by for a slumber party! We talk about what it is like to work with Patti LuPone & navigating being a gay dad and a professional actor. #broadway #podcast #lgbtqia https://lnkd.in/gHB3UGA

My dear friend, former co-star, former improv teammate AND former producer Chris Grace stops by for a Slumber Party! We talk about his time playing Jerry on NBC’s Superstore & what it was like to be an actor and also produce a show that transferred to London. Chris is a hilarious comedian & also an incredible example of how to get ideas MADE! #tvproduction #podcasts #lgbtq #lgbtqia #lgbtqcommunity #comedy #theatres https://lnkd.in/g4S798T

An icon on the #podcast! Guy Branum is a hilarious comedian, television writer, and author of the book My Life as a Goddess. Guy has given me so much advice over the years about how to pursue comedy and he has a wealth of knowledge about pop culture and a law degree! https://lnkd.in/gHEtiY6 #writer #writing #writers #author #comedians #lgbtq #lgbtqiaplus #lgbtqia #book #publishing #culture #television
